description: Set contact detection tolerances. Controls the size of extent used when inserting balls into cell space for contact detection. The extent size includes: minimum extent + 2 × (max interaction distance + constant tolerance + extent tolerance × max extent length + velocity tolerance × max velocity component). Ball is remapped when cumulative translation exceeds this sum. See cycle operations 30.0 (Update Spatial Searching) and 35.0 (Create/delete Contacts) for details.

keywords.name: constant
keywords.description: Set constant contact-detection tolerance (per-ball setting, default: 0). Can be applied to ball range.

keywords.name: extent
keywords.description: Set extent contact-detection tolerance (global setting for all balls, default: 0.01). NOTE: After model restore, call model clean before modifying extent tolerance.

keywords.name: velocity
keywords.description: Set velocity contact-detection tolerance (global setting for all balls, default: 0)

examples.description: Set constant tolerance to 0.01 for all balls
